subject: Public Speaking
title: Confirmation Bias
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Confirmation Bias.

hook.text: People seek evidence that confirms what they already believe.

buildup.text: Your audience will hear your speech through their existing beliefs.

discovery.text: Acknowledge their current views before introducing alternatives.

twist.text: Speeches that ignore confirmation bias fail to persuade.

climax.text: Meet audiences where they are, then gently lead forward.

punchline.text: Start where they are. Lead from there.

quiz.question: What is confirmation bias?
options: Seeking evidence that confirms existing beliefs
